--- title: "Data Acquisition" author: "Navaneet Sridhar" --- ::: callout-note You can delete everything in here and start fresh. ::: #Loading the Libraries ::: {.cell hash='02_data_acquisition_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-1_e4e8af028cb2001ebc437b34e7a69573'} ```{.r .cell-code} library(RSQLite) library(dplyr) library(httr) library(glue) library(jsonlite) library(keyring) library("rstudioapi") library(rvest) ``` ::: #Send GET request to the API ::: {.cell hash='02_data_acquisition_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-2_18c27303a53a06112ff39af82698fa7e'} ```{.r .cell-code} resp <- GET("https://api.openweathermap.org/data/2.5/weather?q=London&appid=a8c19e73b21191e9fa018bef278a9af4") #Reading content from the website weather_data <- fromJSON(content(resp, "text")) %>% as.data.frame() weather_data ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} `````{=html}
````` ::: ::: #Scrape one of the competitor websites of canyon and create a small database. ::: {.cell hash='02_data_acquisition_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-3_861ebef32b22b0041d65f6976231cb52'} ```{.r .cell-code} # Set the URL of the website to scrape url <- "https://www.rosebikes.de/" # Scrape the website html <- read_html(url) # Find the elements that contain the model names model_names <- html %>% html_nodes(".products-slider-tile__product-name") %>% html_text() # Find the elements that contain the prices prices <- html %>% html_nodes(".product-tile-price__current-value") %>% html_text() # Extract the number using regular expressions price <- gsub("[^0-9.,]", "", prices) # Remove all non-digit, non-decimal, and non-comma characters # Create a data frame of the model names and prices database <- data.frame( Model = model_names, Price = price ) # Print the data frame print(database) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` #> Model Price #> 1 XLITE 04 Ultegra 3.299,00 #> 2 XLITE 06 Ultegra 3.999,00 #> 3 BACKROAD GRX RX810 1x11 2.999,00 #> 4 COUNT SOLO 2 849,00 #> 5 THE BRUCE 2 1.199,00 #> 6 BACKROAD AL GRX RX400 1.999,00 #> 7 SNEAK PLUS 2.399,00 #> 8 ROOT MILLER 1 2.299,00 #> 9 PRO SL DISC 105 1.699,00 #> 10 BACKROAD Force eTap AXS XPLR 1x12 Limited 4.899,00 #> 11 THRILL HILL 3 3.999,00 #> 12 BACKROAD AL GRX RX600 1X11 2.349,00 #> 13 MAYOR PLUS 3 Unisex 4.999,00 #> 14 BACKROAD AXS MULLET BUILD 3.999,00 #> 15 Kettenverschleißlehre mit Kettenhalter 5,45 #> 16 P-BOUNCE Bikeshorts 79,95 #> 17 Industrielager 61902-2RS 14,95 #> 18 ITAMOS 2 Fahrradhandschuhe 20,95 #> 19 SV 42 & 60 28" Wide Rennrad Schlauch 2,95 #> 20 FH-S Halter für Apple AirTag 5,95 #> 21 SCORPIONE 3 JERSEY Radtrikot 69,95 #> 22 Strada E-Bike XL Fahrradträger 439,95 #> 23 VALDES MTB Bikeshorts 84,95 #> 24 Multi Cage CF-1 Flaschenhalter Carbon 11,95 #> 25 NECK BRACE DBX 3.5 Nackenprotektor 221,95 #> 26 Fly Tex Trinkflasche 5,95 #> 27 AIRFLEX CHEST PROTECTOR Protektorenweste 145,95 #> 28 Grand Prix 5000 Rennradreifen, Faltreifen (Tube-Type) 34,95 #> 29 Shock Blow - Dämpferpumpe und Federgabelpumpe - 19,95 ``` ::: :::
